description: It feels amazing to know that there is an increased demand for your product, but customer experience and satisfaction are consequential for long-lasting business growth.
name: Arvy Ahmed

description: To earn the respect (and eventually love) of your customers, you first have to respect those customers. That is why Golden Rule behavior is embraced by most of the winning companies.
name: Mehraab Ahmed

description: Thank the guests for coming! You may say it's none of your business, but it's still part of your job.
name: Arif Rahman

description: A good Usherette renders ushering services; not her body, not her address, not her number.
name: Tayeb Hussain

description: The best action you can take as a business professional is to treat each client as a valued customer.
name: Noman Abdullah

description: Your customer service opens up unique opportunities to offer an excellent customer experience
name: Naim Hussain

description: Your marketing plan is not as important as how you plan to invest in the happiness of your customers.
name: Salem Bin Raj
